import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import Container from '@material-ui/core/Container' import Box from '@material-ui/core/Box' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button' import FilterIcon from '@material-ui/icons/FilterList' import IconButton from '@material-ui/core/IconButton' import Close from '@material-ui/icons/Close' const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ mobile: { display:'block', position:'fixed', bottom:0, background:'white', zIndex:101, textAlign:'center', width:'100%', left: "50%", transform:"translate(-50%,0)", padding:'10px 0', border: "1px solid #ddd", }, filterIcon: { color:"#777", fontSize:24, marginRight:10, }, })); const FiltersBar = props => { const classes = useStyles() return (
) } export default FiltersBar
